description:
Serving clients throughout Winnebago County and the surrounding areas from our branch law office in Rockford, Illinois, Donahue & Walsh, P.C. is fully prepared to do whatever we can to help increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you deserve for the injuries and losses you suffered on the job or as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

With our main law office in McHenry and another branch location in Elgin, we have become one of the region's leading legal practices for personal injury, medical malpractice and workers' compensation. We also handle third-party claims for those whose work injury was caused by a negligent party on the job, and to date, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients.

This success is the direct result of our extensive legal experience coupled with our unwavering devotion to those we serve. We understand how insurance companies operate, and we are ready to fight hard on your behalf both inside and outside the courtroom to help you face your legal challenge head-on and to secure a brighter, safer and more financially stable future for yourself and your loved ones.

For more information on how you can begin receiving the aggressive representation and compassionate support you need during this difficult and uncertain time in your life, you can contact Donahue & Walsh, P.C. by phone or through our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation concerning your claim.
